name: Zubaida Tariq
description: Also known as Aapa (elder sister), Zubaida Tariq was a renowned Pakistani chef, cooking expert, and television personality known for her expertise in traditional Pakistani cuisine

recipes.title: Beef Nehari
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Preheat grill to high heat. Season steaks with salt, pepper, and olive oil.
2. Grill steaks for 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare.
3. In a skillet, melt butter and add minced garlic, rosemary, and thyme. Baste steaks with the herbed butter.
4. Let steaks rest for a few minutes before serving.

name: Shireen Anwar
description: Shireen Anwar is a Pakistani chef and cooking show host known for her delicious and diverse recipes. She's popular for sharing both traditional and contemporary Pakistani dishes.

recipes.title: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and fajita seasoning. Cook until no longer pink.
2. Push chicken to the side and add bell peppers and onion. Cook until softened.
3. Serve on warm tortillas. Top with sour cream and salsa.
